actions.committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A resolution urging that Congress adopt the "Freedom" song written by composer and lyricist Donna Cribari of Port Chester, New York, as the official Constitutional Bicentennial Song of the United States.

summary.text: Declares that the Congress collectively urges that the "Freedom" song written by Donna Cribari be adopted as the official Constitutional Bicentennial Song of the United States.

titles.title: A resolution urging that Congress adopt the "Freedom" song written by composer and lyricist Donna Cribari of Port Chester, New York, as the official Constitutional Bicentennial Song of the United States.
